get.summary: Return a list of aspect ratios.

parameters.name: network_id
parameters.description: A network id.

parameters.name: assigned
parameters.description: Only show aspect ratios that have been assigned to the network. Defaults to assigned=true. Pass assigned=false to get a list of aspect ratios that can be assigned to the network. Or assigned=both to get a full list of aspect ratios.

examples._content: Matches the aspect ratio of the original to the closest assigned aspect ratio

get.summary:
Add a new category. All slugs must be unique within the network.
When adding a child slug, the parent must not also be a child. For example, when creating Football under Sports, first create Sports with no parent then create Football passing the slug for Sports. Now that Football is a child it can't be used as a parent. 
The slug and slug's parent is returned on success.

parameters.name: network_id
parameters.description: A network id.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The url friendly slug.

parameters.name: parent_slug
parameters.description: The parent slug.

get.summary:
Return a list of all categories for the network. If network_id isn't passed then the network id for the api_key is used. 
If status is passed then only the categories that are assigned to a show with the passed status are returned. 
Valid values for order_by are "count", "category" and "latest_published". 
The count attribute on the category element is the number of shows that are assigned to the category. 
latest_published is the latest published show date of all shows assigned to that category.

parameters.name: network_id
parameters.description: A network id.

parameters.name: parent_slug
parameters.description: The parent slug.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The value for the show's status.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: The order the results are returned in.

parameters.name: sequence
parameters.description: By default, results are ordered in ascending sequence. To sort in descending sequence, pass desc.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of results to return.

get.summary:
Add a new channel. The following parameters set "defaults" for all shows created in the channel:
	
				status
				ftp_status
				filename
				metadata_title
				metadata_artist
				metadata_album
				metadata_year
				metadata_genre
				metadata_label
				metadata_copyright
				metadata_isrc
				metadata_upc
				metadata_release_date
				metadata_comments
				If the ftp_status parameter is not passed, its value defaults to the value passed in status. 
				
				The id of the new channel is returned, on success.

parameters.name: cp_id
parameters.description: A content producer id.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type. Current legal values are "audio" or "video". Passing "1" for audio and "2" for video is also valid.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The value for the show's status.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The url friendly slug.

parameters.name: ftp_status
parameters.description: The default status for a show that is created by ftp.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of tags (tag1,tag2,tag3).

parameters.name: website
parameters.description: The website url.

parameters.name: rss
parameters.description: The rss feed url.

parameters.name: itunes
parameters.description: The itunes subscription uri.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The filename of a show. If creating a new show, a timestamp will be appended. For example, if filename is set to "example" then the resulting show filename will be "example_ 2007-05-05-192651".

parameters.name: sp_slugs
parameters.description: A comma separated list of syndication partner slugs.

parameters.name: category_slugs
parameters.description: A comma separated list of category slugs.

parameters.name: disable_feed
parameters.description: Disable the show(s) from appearing in Feeds. Published shows will always appear in playlists.

parameters.name: metadata_title
parameters.description: The metadata title for the show.

parameters.name: metadata_artist
parameters.description: The metadata artist for the show.

parameters.name: metadata_album
parameters.description: The metadata album for the show.

parameters.name: metadata_year
parameters.description: The metadata year for the show.

parameters.name: metadata_genre
parameters.description: The metadata genre for the show.

parameters.name: metadata_label
parameters.description: The metadata label for the show.

parameters.name: metadata_copyright
parameters.description: The metadata copyright for the show.

parameters.name: metadata_isrc
parameters.description: The metadata isrc for the show.

parameters.name: metadata_upc
parameters.description: The metadata upc for the show.

parameters.name: metadata_release_date
parameters.description: The release date of the show in any valid format. Example: 2004-02-12. For valid formats see GNU Date Input Formats. The time portion of the date is stripped. If parsing of the date fails then "now" is used.

parameters.name: metadata_comments
parameters.description: The metadata comments for the show.

parameters.name: itunes_default_season
parameters.description: A default season number for episodes.

parameters.name: itunes_default_episode_type
parameters.description: Default type of episode
